nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农业农村部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农业农村部

location.zh-cn: 北京市朝阳区农展馆南里11号
location.en: No. 11 Nongzhanguan Nanli, Chaoyang District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门之一，主要负责统筹研究和组织实施“三农”工作战略、规划和政策，监督管理种植业、畜牧业、渔业、农垦、农业机械化、农产品质量安全，负责农业投资管理等工作。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, primarily responsible for coordinating, researching, and implementing strategies, plans, and policies for agriculture, rural areas, and farmers; supervising and managing crop production, animal husbandry, fisheries, land reclamation, agricultural mechanization, and agricultural product quality and safety; and overseeing agricultural investment management.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农业农村部管理的国家局。原为单设的国务院直属机构，2023年其职责被划入农业农村部，并在农业农村部加挂牌子。
description.en: A national administration managed by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China. It was formerly a separate agency directly under the State Council, and its functions were integrated into the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs in 2023, with its nameplate retained at the ministry.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农业农村部的主要前身机构，曾历经多次分立与合并。
description.en: The main predecessor of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China, which underwent several splits and mergers throughout its history.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 于2018年3月举行的会议，会议通过了《国务院机构改革方案》，决定组建农业农村部，不再保留农业部。
description.en: A session held in March 2018 that passed the 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan', deciding to form the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs and abolish the Ministry of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。现任中华人民共和国农业农村部部长、党组书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician. Currently serving as the Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国农业农村部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国农业农村部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国农业农村部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国农业农村部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央纪委国家监委驻农业农村部纪检监察组组长，农业农村部党组成员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the CCDI and NSC at the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, and a member of the ministry's Party Leadership Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国农业农村部党组成员，兼任中国农业科学院院长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a member of the Party Leadership Group of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, concurrently serving as the President of the Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家级综合性农业科学研究机构，为农业农村部直属事业单位。
description.en: A national-level comprehensive agricultural scientific research institution in the People's Republic of China, and a public institution directly under the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国农业农村部党组成员。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently a member of the Party Leadership Group of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国农业农村部国家首席兽医师（官）。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the National Chief Veterinarian (Officer) of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国农业农村部总畜牧师。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chief Livestock Husbandry Officer of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国农业农村部总农艺师。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chief Agronomist of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物。2018年担任国务院副总理时，为新组建的农业农村部揭牌。
description.en: A Chinese politician. While serving as Vice Premier of the State Council in 2018, he officially unveiled the newly formed Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 于2023年3月举行的会议，会议批准了新一轮《国务院机构改革方案》，将国家乡村振兴局职责划入农业农村部。
description.en: A session held in March 2023 that approved a new 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan', integrating the functions of the National Rural Revitalization Administration into the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的农业主管机构，是中华人民共和国农业部的前身。
description.en: The agricultural authority established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, and the predecessor to the Ministry of Agriculture.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central governing body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国林业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国林业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经设立的林业主管机构，曾与农业部等合并为农林部。
description.en: A former ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for forestry, which was once merged with the Ministry of Agriculture and others to form the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水产部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水产部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经设立的水产业主管机构，曾与农业部等合并为农林部。
description.en: A former ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for fisheries, which was once merged with the Ministry of Agriculture and others to form the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农林部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农林部

description.zh-cn: 由原农业部、林业部和水产部于1970年合并成立的机构，1979年被撤销。
description.en: An institution formed in 1970 by the merger of the former Ministry of Agriculture, Ministry of Forestry, and Ministry of Fisheries, which was dissolved in 1979.

nodes.id: 第五届全国人大常委会

zh-cn: 第五届全国人大常委会

description.zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会的常设机关，于1979年决定撤销农林部，分设农业部和林业部。
description.en: The standing committee of the 5th National People's Congress, which decided in 1979 to dissolve the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry and re-establish the Ministry of Agriculture and the Ministry of Forestry.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农牧渔业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农牧渔业部

description.zh-cn: 由原农业部、农垦部、国家水产总局于1982年合并设立的机构，1988年被撤销并重组为农业部。
description.en: An institution established in 1982 by the merger of the former Ministry of Agriculture, Ministry of Land Reclamation, and State Administration of Aquatic Products. It was dissolved and reorganized back into the Ministry of Agriculture in 1988.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国农垦部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农垦部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经设立的农垦主管机构，后并入农牧渔业部。
description.en: A former ministry of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for land reclamation, which was later merged into the Ministry of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Fishery.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经设立的水产主管机构，后并入农牧渔业部。
description.en: A former administration of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for aquatic products, which was later merged into the Ministry of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Fishery.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国农业农村部部长、党组书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as the Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国农业部部长和改组后的农业农村部首任部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China and the first Minister of the reorganized Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国农业部副部长、农业农村部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国农业部副部长、农业农村部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国农业部副部长、农业农村部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国农业部副部长、农业农村部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国农业农村部副部长、党组副书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as a Vice Minister and Deputy Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as a Vice Minister of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese politician who formerly served as the Minister of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国农业农村部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国农业农村部是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门之一。
description.en: The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs is one of the constituent departments of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农业农村部

description.zh-cn: 2023年国务院机构改革后，原单设的国家乡村振兴局职责划入农业农村部，在农业农村部加挂国家乡村振兴局牌子，成为其管理的国家局。
description.en: After the 2023 State Council institutional reform, the functions of the formerly separate National Rural Revitalization Administration were integrated into the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, which now also holds the nameplate of the National Rural Revitalization Administration, making it a national administration managed by the ministry.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农业农村部

description.zh-cn: 会议通过《国务院机构改革方案》，决定将农业部与国家发改委、财政部、国土资源部、水利部的部分农业相关职责整合，组建农业农村部。
description.en: The session passed the 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan', deciding to form the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs by integrating the Ministry of Agriculture with certain agriculture-related functions from the NDRC, Ministry of Finance, Ministry of Land and Resources, and Ministry of Water Resources.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农业部

description.zh-cn: 会议通过《国务院机构改革方案》，决定不再保留农业部。
description.en: The session passed the 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan', deciding to abolish the Ministry of Agriculture.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农业农村部

description.zh-cn: 时任国务院副总理胡春华为新组建的农业农村部正式揭牌成立。
description.en: Then-Vice Premier of the State Council Hu Chunhua officially unveiled the newly established Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

relationships.source: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 国家乡村振兴局

description.zh-cn: 会议批准《国务院机构改革方案》，决定将国家乡村振兴局的职责划入农业农村部，不再保留单设的国家乡村振兴局。
description.en: The session approved the 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan', deciding to integrate the functions of the National Rural Revitalization Administration into the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs and abolish it as a separate entity.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农业部

description.zh-cn: 1954年，中央人民政府农业部改名为中华人民共和国农业部。
description.en: In 1954, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Central People's Government was renamed the Ministry of Agriculture of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农林部

description.zh-cn: 决定将农业部、林业部和水产部合并，设立农林部。
description.en: Decided to merge the Ministry of Agriculture, Ministry of Forestry, and Ministry of Fisheries to establish the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry.

relationships.source: 第五届全国人大常委会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农林部

description.zh-cn: 决定撤销农林部，并分设农业部和林业部。
description.en: Decided to dissolve the Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry and re-establish the Ministry of Agriculture and the Ministry of Forestry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农牧渔业部

description.zh-cn: 在国务院机构改革中，将农业部、农垦部、国家水产总局合并设立农牧渔业部。
description.en: During the State Council institutional reform, the Ministry of Agriculture, Ministry of Land Reclamation, and State Administration of Aquatic Products were merged to establish the Ministry of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Fishery.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农牧渔业部

description.zh-cn: 根据国务院机构改革方案，撤销农牧渔业部，设立农业部。
description.en: According to the State Council institutional reform plan, the Ministry of Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Fishery was dissolved, and the Ministry of Agriculture was established.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国农业农村部
